title: Tuzigoot National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Historic Photographs   28 Photos  Photos taken of the Tuzigoot excavation and reconstruction/stabilization of the site during the 1934-35 WPA program.          Archeological Sites   5 Photos  Archeological Sites          Linking Hispanic Heritage   6 Photos  Linking Hispanic Heritage Through Archaeology (LHHTA) is a program for urban Hispanic youth and teachers, aimed to broaden their cultural understanding and give train in skills for success.  Participants explore Hispanic heritage through field trips, lectures, workshops, tours, field archaeology, hands-on activities and multimedia journaling.            Artifacts   2 Photos  The Tuzigoot museum showcases many artifacts excavated from the pueblo in the 1930s.  These artifacts tell us about the daily life for the people who lived here.          Cultural Resources   2 Photos  Staff in our Cultural Resources division work hard to stabilize and otherwise care for our archeological sites. Check out their work!          Wildlife Camera   7 Photos  This hidden wildlife camera at Tuzigoot is capturing images of some pretty awesome animals.            Flowers   12 Photos  Flowers          Reptiles and Amphibians   6 Photos  Reptiles and Amphibians          Tavasci Marsh   5 Photos  Tavasci Marsh            Birds   2 Photos  Tavasci Marsh at Tuzigoot has been named an Important Bird Area by the Audubon Society.  Check out this gallery as we add more photos of year-round and migratory avian residents.          Insects and Arachnids   2 Photos  Insects, spiders and scorpions.          Media Quality Photos   3 Photos  This gallery contains large high resolution photos of our site.
